Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Vickie S
Reviews.Content: I've never wrote a review before but was so pleased with everything about this motel I wanted to let others know. Pete and Elizabeth were so warm and friendly. It was a very clean enviroment. It made you feel as if you were staying with family instead of strangers. The price was reasonable. We are planning a trip back there in a couple of years and we will be making reservations at this location. Thanks Pete and Elizabeth for all your hospitality and the Christian atmosphere that you can feel when you walk in the door.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Santa Fe, New Mexico, United States
Reviews.Title: “PERFECT HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Linda C
Reviews.Content: WOW! This place was perfect. After a couple of bad choices the nights before, this place was a BIG breath of fresh air. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. All the staff people visit and laugh a lot--it was fun. Not loud and raucous, just having fun. Made you feel at home. The rooms were very clean, bright and nicely air conditioned (in room control, of course). Breakfast was a surprise--a staff member greeted you and kept everything nice and clean. Nice selection of food. I would definitely stay at this hotel on my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: travelfan541
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay at the Super 8. The room was very comfortable, clean, and quiet. The staff was particularly helpful in suggesting shows to see. I would definetly recommend this motel and would stay there again when in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay here again”
Reviews.Author: driverSunsetBeach_NC
Reviews.Content: The Super 8 in Branson is a great value with a good location. It's across the street from the Andy Williams theater and you can cut through their parking lot to the main road which saves some time and traffic lights! The rooms are large,very clean and the staff is friendly and helpful. The usual carbs for breakfast.We highly reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: Joanne0810
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for two nights and we were very pleased. The rooms were clean and well maintained, the staff were friendly and helpful, and the location was very convenient. My 6 year old niece enjoyed the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place/great location”
Reviews.Author: pam2707
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay in Branson. Elizabeth, the owner, was very accommodating. The entire staff was very friendly. Pam, in the breakfast area, was just delightful. The rooms were clean and welcoming. The location was perfect for every attraction that we went to. Nothing fancy here, but a great value!.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: clyde r
Reviews.Content: great staff , good location , very quiet , good breakfast , very helpful at front desk and kind

Reviews.Title: “Weekend trip”
Reviews.Author: Teresa B
Reviews.Content: This place was amazing!!!!!! I will be recommending this to all my friends and family. The rooms were very clean. The beds were new and amazing to sleep in. I never heard any noisy coming from other rooms or outside my door. There breakfast was very fresh. The owners were there and are very very very friendly to talk to. I will be going back and I will only stay at this super 8.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Sylvia M
Reviews.Content: Our stay was very pleasant. The rooms were clean and we could see that they had been updated to include new bedding and drapes. The price was very affordable, the staff friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the continental breakfasts and the chocolate chip cookies at night were a nice perk. I would stay here again and will tell family and friends about our experience. Sylvia M.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff, super clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: saxysai
Reviews.Content: I don't think I can say enough positive things about our stay here. I took a group of high school kids here on a school trip and chose to stay here because I was looking for a motel with inside access rooms that was clean but affordable. When I called to make the reservations, they were very friendly in accomidating our needs, and were even friendlier once we arrived at the motel. I have also never stayed in a motel with rooms as clean as these. The breakfast in the morning is pretty decent as well. I know that usually a bus full of teenagers is the worst nightmare of a hotel, so it was very refreshing that my kids were welcomed with enthusiasm, not skepticism. This is a great place to stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “"Lost" Reservation”
Reviews.Author: saiza
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for three nights over a month ago. And the Tuesday before we were supposed to leave for vacation, my boyfriend called to confirm the reservation. He had booked it online through Super 8's website, but didn't print out the confirmation. When he called the hotel they said that no one with that name was staying at the hotel at all; there was no reservation under his name. He even called corporate and they had no reservation for him in the system at all. He couldn't find the confirmation email and never printed out the confirmation on the website. So we ended up having to rebook the room for 20 dollars more a night; that's why we booked the Super 8 in the first place, because we were getting it for 50 dollars a night. So when we booked again, they magically raised the price of the same room 20 dollars. We told the clerk when we got there, but all she could say was "eh computers, what can you do?" She didn't even offer us a discount or anything. Now I'm beginning to wonder if it's not some sort of scam with the website. Quote you a low price, then "lose" your reservation only to have to book it again at a higher rate. The room itself was fine, it was pretty small and there was just the two of us. It did have a mini fridge in the room, but no microwave. The beds were firm but soft, very comfortable. The toilet had a hard time flushing, you had to hold the handle down forever before it flushed. And the water was so soft, it felt like you never got the soap off your hands. The hotel had an outdoor pool that was open till 10, it was very nice and clean, but it was a bit too cool out to swim. They also offered a continental breakfast, which was very basic, two kinds of cold cereal, oatmeal, bagels, bread, and mini donuts. They also served biscuits and gravy which were pretty good. The hotel also served warm chocolate chip cookies after 8 in the lobby. The other drawback besides getting ripped off, was there was no elevator in the hotel. We were on the third floor and used the stairs all the time. It wouldn't be a good hotel for someone who can't do stairs.

Reviews.Title: “Terrific!”
Reviews.Author: John W
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed 7 nights in May/12. The rooms were well equipped and 'clean'. Service was exceptional with daily inquiries about whether we had any needs etc. Breadfast had lots of choices and of course chocolate chip cookies for night snack much appreciated. Staff very friendly and helpful and willing to chat with a positive attitude displayed including cleaning staff. Thanks for a great experience and would highly recommend this hotel! We would defintely stay here again. John and Sharon

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME!”
Reviews.Author: burgejustin
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very nice, clean, quiet, comfortable, and great value for the price. Fresh baked chocolate chip cookies every night at 9... YUM! We had to leave a day earlier than our reservation and it was a hassel-free ordeal, no extra charge, and we didn't even have to pay for the last day. Hotel was close to everything we wanted to do in Branson. My husband and I would definitely recommend to anybody and would absolutely stay here again! WONDERFUL!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect lower priced mid level quality.”
Reviews.Author: Richard B
Reviews.Content: Stayed four nights in April 2012 with no problems or complaints. Value received was substantially more than price paid. Owners (husband&wife) are onsite and very knowledgeable and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Christian owned place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: JohnDanitaHigh
Reviews.Content: Wonderful experience at the Super 8. Very clean rooms and awesome staff! Located in the heart of Branson. Quite and peaceful. We will stay again! "Beautiful Mornings begin at 8"

Reviews.Title: “"super"”
Reviews.Author: justbcuzaew
Reviews.Content: everything about this motel was "super". clean, friendly, great location and restful. best money we ever spent! go eat at Florentina's Ristorante Italiano down the street. fabulous!

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Terry S
Reviews.Content: Warm, Hospitable, Knowledgable, and Curtious. What more could you want? Clean room, got it. Great in room Coffee, got it. Good FREE Breakfast, got it. One of if not the BEST Super 8 I have stayed at. I travel for work and stay at a lot of hotels. This one is Great. Can't wait to return for Vacation and I will stay here.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Mary E
Reviews.Content: The management (Pete And Elizabeth ) were extremely friendly and welcoming. It felt like home. Made some exceptions for our needs. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location/Clean room”
Reviews.Author: Mongo2kool
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel for the first time in early December, 2011. The room was very clean and is in a great location, on the "yellow street route" of Branson, which enables you to go from one end of town to another, by passing the bottle neck traffic on Highway 76. The room was very clean, however, the T.V. was not a flat screen and the cable TV reception was a little spotty. The WiFi, which is free, was extremely fast and never lost a connection. The staff was super friendly and the breakfast was good, consisting of biscuits and gravy, cereal, donuts, two kinds of juices, coffee. It is right behind the Andy Williams Theater and is a easy walk to see the performance. Would stay there again...I used my Entertainment 2012 coupon book an booked the room through one of the websites, saving me about 15 dollars per night!

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: oletimer1
Reviews.Content: After staying at several other Branson hotels we deceided to try this Super 8. The price was right, no buses, and in a convient location to everywhere from Green Mountain Dr quickly. It is a backway to everywhere in Branson area. Found it clean and staff friendly. Only inconvience was breakfast area was small, but who wants a continental breakfast and watery scrambled eggs when there is many great places for breakfast. I can get scambled eggs and bagels at home.

Reviews.Title: “Great small hotel, super clean, good location”
Reviews.Author: ATravelerMidwest
Reviews.Content: When visiting Branson in the future we will return to this hotel. The outside and inside is very well kept, nicely decorated, new, modern and charming. A nice blend of new and country charm which gives the hotel a warm friendly feel. Beautiful Fall/Harvest decorations in and outside the hotel during our visit. Several good points to mention: 1. nice staff at the reception desk, who will help to arrange show tickets and provide info. 2. clean and new furnishings such as carpet, bedspreads and drapes, clean rooms, halls, baths, breakfast room, nice towels, shower curtain, etc., 3. breakfast is included in room rate, nice but small breakfast room with flatscreen TV. Food is good, donuts, rolls, milk, several selections of cereal, one hot cereal, mixed fruit, toast, juice, coffee, teas, biscuts and gravey. It is a nice selection that provides a basic good breakfast. 4. Room is nice with table, chairs, free computer connection, TV, new drapes, bedspread, bedding, towels, blow dryer, doors appear new, sink, shower and tub are newer, not worn in appearance, new furniture and a mini refrig. No microwave in the room, but one is located in the breakfast room, nice wall hangings. Quiet and comfortable. 5. After the evening shows we appreciated returning to the hotel to find warm homemade chocolate chip cookies, such a nice touch. 6. Great location, next to Andy Williams Theater, off the main Hwy. 76 where many activites, shows, shopping, & restaurants are located. We walked to Andy Williams Moon River Theater and Grill restuarant. Very near to Tanger Outlet Mall, Easy to drive via Hwy.76 to downtown Branson and to Branson Landing Mall. Overall it was a very pleasant experience, very quiet and very clean with good service and a great location, so it meant all our needs, as we are very picky about cleanliness and location.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Hens64
Reviews.Content: Just got from a 3 night stay at this hotel. Booked because of the good reviews on Trip Advisor and was pleased that they were correct. Hotel is clean even in the hallways. Owner Pete is a great guy and goes out of his way to accomadate you. We will stay here again. We really appreciate Peten & Liz's christian witness.

Reviews.Title: “This one is great!”
Reviews.Author: Kathy47Coldwater_MI
Reviews.Content: Stayed here because of good reviews on Trip Advisor and was not disappointed! The owners are onsite plus being warm and friendly.Cleanliness is my number one criteria for a motel and this place exceeded expectations.The price was right and the location convenient.I complimented owner Liz and she acknowledged that with so many hotels in Branson that competition was fierce.We purchased show tickets through the number the hotel gave us and tickets were delivered to our room by owner-didn't even have to go to front desk like we thought-and the group they used had good discounted prices for shows.

Reviews.Title: “A great Branson hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Swizzlemeister
Reviews.Content: After reading the good reports on Trip Advisor, we booked 2 nights here last weekend. We were on business and had tight connections between appointments so we were delighted when Pete, the owner, let us check in early. We even had time to freshen up and catch our breath. Our room was conveniently located off the reception/lobby and breakfast room, and we couldn't hear any noise from those areas from our room. I didn't get to meet Pete's wife, Liz, but my husband said she was very nice and helpful. The weekend staff were attentive, as well. Our room was spotless with comfortable beds and good airconditioning. We had dinner both nights at the Andy Williams Moon River Grill which is located through a parking lot directly across from the hotel. Super 8 Branson/Andy Williams Theater will definitely be our next Branson destination!

Reviews.Title: “Great place, friendly people!”
Reviews.Author: penmintex
Reviews.Content: The value is tremendous - nice rooms, and very nice front-desk people! We will stay there again, no doubt!

Reviews.Title: “They are the absolute BEST!”
Reviews.Author: Ernie-Sharlene R
Reviews.Content: We LOVE the Branson Super 8! They are centrally located and close to EVERYTHING in Branson. Home made chocolate chip cookies and they are Christian owned and ran and we just love them! Clean rooms, great breakfast and awesome pool!

Reviews.Title: “Was the cleanest Super 8 I have ever stayed at”
Reviews.Author: KrisT47
Reviews.Content: Our experience with this Super 8 was excellent. When we arrived the owner and his wife were at the desk. Great people. They let us check in early, and were very accomodating. First thing I noticed that stood out from the rest was that even the hallways were tidy and vacuumed, carpet clean as was all the walls, breakfast area. The rooms were very comfortable, sheets, bed all spotless. I would definately recommend staying here if you aren't a resort type person. We had an online coupon for 2 nights for $99. Can't beat that. So worth it (and actually more). Thanks for everything we had a great time in Branson. We also got tickets thru them and were delivered to the hotel.....

Reviews.Title: “Clean and inexpensive!!”
Reviews.Author: bethlaga
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights and the place was perfect for us! Clean and cheap with a nice pool! The breakfast was ok. The air conditioning was fantastic in our room. We will probably stay here again when we go back. The owners were very nice and friendly!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay at an Excellent price!”
Reviews.Author: willcmass
Reviews.Content: Was impressed with the overall experience. Nice, quite hotel, within minutes of all the attractions. Rooms were clean and hotel staff was exceptional. For the cost, it was unbeatable. Would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again”
Reviews.Author: enjoying_retirement
Reviews.Content: The Branson Super 8 at Andy Williams Theater is well located about a block off of the main road through the Branson music area. The check in went very smoothly with friendly desk clerk. Room was a double queen with a small table and two chairs. It was a hot day and the air conditioner was running with the room a comfortable temperature. The wireless was one that you had to hunt for an id and password to use. I had to call the office to find it. The room had a refrigerator and was clean. Parking was convenient and did not have to carry luggage up or down stairs since there is parking access to both 1st and 2nd levels. The breakfast was very simple and was limited to fruit, bread, pastries and associated items. It is a well run Super 8 with good value.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: grandpa13
Reviews.Content: This motel was very clean. All the workers were friendly & helpful.The bed was extremely comfortable (King Sized). The rates were reasonable and Wyndham Rewards were offered. Tickets for shows were offered through an independant company, and were discounted. This is definitely a good place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: MarcosB44532
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a good deal plus beat all exspectations great people and place so clean and kept up

Reviews.Title: “Great clean place,Wonderful Christian people.”
Reviews.Author: woodcuttertim
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased with our 4 day stay.The rooms were very clean and very accommodating. The staff was very friendly and made sure we had everything we needed.They realy bent over backwards to make our trip pleasing. Liz and Pete was right there to see you ever need was met. We will stay here everytime that we go to Branson. Thanks very much for a great time and great fellowship.

Reviews.Title: “This is the only hotel we will stay in while in Branson, MO.”
Reviews.Author: cmivins
Reviews.Content: This is the only hotel we will stay in while in Branson, MO. This hotel has clean rooms, fantastic service, and the friendliest staff in Branson. We stayed for 4 days with a two children, ages 6 and 11 months. The rooms are very clean, and the staff is very accommodating! They went above and beyond what anyone would expect to make our trip enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “This is the best yet!!”
Reviews.Author: delsprague
Reviews.Content: This motel is super clean, the maids do a terrific job. The owners Pete and Elizabeth go out of their way to make you feel at home. They also are fun to visit with! They go to a lot of effort to answer questions for you, give you directions and suggest places to see. Yes I will be back.! Sincerely, Del Sprague delsprague@msn.com

Reviews.Title: “Great clean, comfortable, Christian motel”
Reviews.Author: krhods
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay in a motel that isn't afraid to profess to being Christians. It was very clean and comfortable. The cookies were a nice treat in the evening.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Place, Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: TooYoungToBeOld
Reviews.Content: I took my 82 year old Mom for a "girls get-away" and we had a blast reliving the past as we attended the Andy Williams show and remembered all the times our family gathered around our only tv to watch his show. This is the perfect place to stay if you like clean, quiet, comfortable rooms, friendly on-site owners, excellent, helpful staff and interacting with other friendly guests. Free breakfast included (cereal, yogurt, muffins, fruit and biscuits & gravy). Best part - hot cookies and coffee every night! Location is just one street off the main drag in a quiet, scenic area right across from the Andy Williams Theater The site is central to everything you would want to do. Parking lot is level and very easy to access and desk clerks provided excellent, easy directions to all the shows, outlet malls, and other areas of Branson. Andy Williams Moon River Grill, Panera Bread and a nice Italian restaurant are within 2-3 blocks. Weather was chilly so didn't use outdoor pool but it was clean and in a pretty area. Owners were in the process of putting up fall decorations which added charm to the location.

Reviews.Title: “We were very pleased. Wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: mi3sons
Reviews.Content: My husband and I always dread trips due to bad hotel choices in the past. We were very pleased with this hotel. It was extremely clean, the pool was clean, and the staff was friendly. The location is wonderful if you have needs such as the only Mcdonalds or walmart in town, since it is located less than one block from both. Very handy to the dam, silver dollar city, and off the beat food and restaurants. I would rate this hotel as a 9.5 out of 10 and I would stay again without hesitation. It isn't fancy but it is one of the cleanest hotels I have stayed in. The cookies are a nice touch to if you have kids that they provide in the evenings. :)

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: sightseerNb_Tx
Reviews.Content: Stayed 4 nites and everything was great. clean rooms with donuts, bagels, cereal, fruit and biscuits and gravy for breakfast. the staff was friendly, especially Eric at the front desk, very polite, knowledgeable and courteous.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, friendly, clean and great location”
Reviews.Author: timelessclassic
Reviews.Content: My wife, son and I stayed at the super 8 over Memorial weekend. Have stayed at a lot of places in Branson and this is now our fav. Nice rooms, extra clean with all the standard amenities. My son loved the in room wifi (ugh) luckily free and the pool. Nice breakfast with a couple of different cereals, biscuits and gravy, juices etc..FREE fresh cookies every evening (also loved by hungry teen). Great location just off the 76 strip. branson was busy during the long weekend and the location was walking distance to mini golf, a couple of good restaurants, craft mall, outlets (hide the credit card) walmart and the ducks. the husband/wife owners were onsite the entire weekend (how often do you see that?) and they (mostly Elizabeth?) even served breakfast and made sure everyone had whatever they needed. My wife appreciated their guest laundry and so I got to spend some quality time with our dirty laundry...I thought I was on vacation...The owner even offered to take us flying in his plane when my son looked bored (which is always) but we had to leave monday morning, sounded like fun but not advertised just ask. Staff is really great they all seemed to love working there. Nice to see people take pride in their jobs! loved Silver dollar city too and the ducks were fun. Front desk guy showed us a couple swimming areas on the lake to cool off. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, convenient , quiet and reasonably priced...”
Reviews.Author: CKH7
Reviews.Content: Great centrally located motel that is off the Strip on Green Mountain behind the Andy Williams Theatre. I spent 9 days during Thanksgiving and really enjoyed my stay. Very reasonably priced, spotlessly clean, comfortable beds, nice towels, concrete walls that made it extremely quiet, convenient parking, yellow route for travel and delicious cookies in the evenings after the shows. I needed something inexpensive ($62 a night), clean and comfortable so I could afford tickets for 25 shows during my stay. The owners, Pete and Elizabeth Capko were visible every morning and Eric, the manager, was most helpful with directions and restaurant suggestions. Previously have stayed at the Hilton Convention Center Hotel and Holiday Inn, but liked the location and accessibility of this motel. Will definitely stay again .

Reviews.Title: “Great Branson Stay!”
Reviews.Author: StraitGirl
Reviews.Content: My husband and I, along with my Dad and his wife, stayed here for Thanksgiving weekend. Our room was very clean and comfortable - no frills. Everything was in working order, and the beds were surprisingly comfortable. The young couple who owns this establishment are nice Christian people - Eric was just wonderful! He made the best cookies each night! My step mom needed help getting all of her stuff into her room, and he so graciously helped. The breakfast consisted of hot/cold cereals, pastries, fruit, biscuits/gravy, milk, juices and coffee. Not fancy but filling. The breakfast area was small, so you need to either go early or late. The staff makes sure everything is kept clean during breakfast time. There is no elevator, but both floors 1 and 2 can be entered from ground level if you park on the corresponding side. The third floor is the only one where stairs are required. We stayed 3 nights and it was always VERY quiet. I normally have to use ear plugs when I travel, but not here. And that was with a "full house" each night. The location is convenient to the shows, restaurants and malls as well. For a clean and comfortable place to stay at a great price (probably one of the lowest in Branson) this is a great choice. We will definitely return!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice!”
Reviews.Author: beachinfool
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean, in a very good location on the yellow route, and just overall ver cozy. The price was very reasonable also. I will definately stay here again and recommend to anyone. A+++++

Reviews.Title: “Above average Super 8 !”
Reviews.Author: sir1900
Reviews.Content: We were pleased with the prompt and professional service received from the staff at this Super 8. The facility was clean and modern. The room was of good size and very well kept. The beds were comfortable and the bathroom was clean and well maintained. The location is excellent relative to all the shopping centres and tourist attractions. Make sure you try some of their fresh-baked cookies -- they are really good!

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointed and Won't Return”
Reviews.Author: abigaylePittsburgh
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel last week for six days. It was very clean, when they cleaned your room. Our last night there was horrible. When we left in the morning, we told the maid she coul clean our room, because we were leaving. We were gone all day for a trip to Eureka Srings. When we returned at about nine o'clock our room had not been cleaned. The kicker was that we tipped the maid everyday. When my husband reported this to the clerk, he said they would credit us ten dollars. We were insulted! We had to deal with a pile of dirty towels, a dirty tub, and an unmade bed. The breakfast was sparse. When we went to breakfast there were two donuts available, and weren't restocked by the owner who was in the breakfast room. When a guest questioned the breakfast the owner said that's what you get for getting up late- so rude. Good luck in getting cookies, even with the sign that stated only two per person sometimes there weren't any left. You could get some if Eric was working, because he was the hardest worker there. We wouldn't recommend this motel to anyone!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: pg211purple
Reviews.Content: This is a very clean place to stay. Great for the price. Good continental breakfast. Well stocked unlike most hotels that run out of food half way through the serving time. Fresh baked cookies in the evening. Nice pool. Staff very helpful. Computer with internet access in the lobby. Will definately stay next trip to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “good for a night getaway”
Reviews.Author: ontheopenroad
Reviews.Content: my friends and i stayed here for a night after a night on the town. it was my friends birthday so they let us bring in cake and decorations. the room was basic but clean and cheap enough. and the clerk was nice and we had a speedy check in. i liked the late check out time of 11 am! over all if you just need a night away from home stay here!!!!

Reviews.Title: “WOW! What a charming motel”
Reviews.Author: 1tony1
Reviews.Content: Clean, well run, excellent staff, close to everything. Young couple who own the motel are friendly and knowledgeable about all aspects of the business and where to go and what to see. Very pleased with our stay and will definitely stay on my next business trip to Branson.

HotelInfo.Name: Super 8 Branson/Andy Williams Theatre
HotelInfo.Address: 2490 Green Mountain Drive, Highway 65 to Highway 76 W, Branson, MO 65616-3802
